p: The Zika virus epidemic in Brazil is unique in that Brazil is the only country with simultaneous transmission of four medically important arboviruses: chikungunya, dengue virus, Zika virus, and yellow fever virus. All four can cause neurological and neuromuscular complications including GBS. 19, 20 Distinguishing between chikungunya, dengue virus, and Zika virus is difficult because of similar signs and symptoms and the low sensitivity and specificity of laboratory assays. 21
